headline: American Water Charitable Foundation supports Sacramento Food Bank and Family Services with $5,000 State Strategic Impact Grant
summary: This holiday season, the American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., and California American Water are proud to support Sacramento Food Bank and Family Services with a $5,000 State Strategic Impact Grant, provided by the Foundation. headline: Kentucky American Water Proudly Recognizes American Water Charitable Foundation 2025 Workforce Readiness Grantees
summary: The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., recently announced two organizations were awarded a Workforce Readiness grant, supporting communities served by Kentucky American Water.

content.title: Kentucky American Water Proudly Recognizes American Water Charitable Foundation 2025 Workforce Readiness Grantees
content.summary: The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., recently announced two organizations were awarded a Workforce Readiness grant, supporting communities served by Kentucky American Water.
